trans-unit.source: On March 27th 2020, Motion-Twin published a message on its platform Twinoid about the end of Flash by the end of 2020. Their games will be gradually closed based on how the player-base dwindles. Faced with the situation, a few players decided to start a project to save those games: the project Eternal-Twin. Their goal is to keep the corresponding online communities alive and avoid losing this part of video-gaming history. This project is lead by Demurgos and TheMoa59, for the technical and organizational side respectively. We also want to thank MrPapy for helping to start the project. Anyone is free to join and help. Useful links: Eternal-Twin Discord server: Main communication channelEternal Twinpedia: Wiki for the Motion-Twin gamesEternal-Twin Gitlab organization: All our source-code
trans-unit.note: Presentation of the Eternal-Twin project
Title of the general informations section

trans-unit.source: Eternal-Twin is a non-commercial website operate by hobbyists. Its the goal to archive Motion-Twin's games. This means we want to ensure they remain available even if the official website closes. We are not related to Motion-Twin.
trans-unit.note: Section describing who we are

trans-unit.source: We reverse engineered some of the games: this is done with the sole purpose of archiving them. We oppose anyone using information we found in order to gain an unfair advantage in any game (even single-player games). We base our judgement on the expectation of the community, not on what is technically possible or not: something may be possible while still being considered cheating.
trans-unit.note: Section explaining we're against cheating

trans-unit.source: Don't worry: you'll be able to edit all the values below in your profile if you ever want to.

trans-unit.note: Username field label

trans-unit.source: The identifier you want to use to sign-in. It must be a unique name containing only "a-z", "0-9" or "_".

trans-unit.note: Display name field label

trans-unit.source: How your name should be displayed to other players. You can use any letter, spaces and parenthesis.

trans-unit.note: Password field label

trans-unit.source: The username must be at least characters long.
The username must be at most characters long.
The username can only use the lowercase english letters "a-z" and digits "0-9" (it must start with a letter).
The display name must be at least characters long.
The display name must be at most characters long.
The display name can only use letters, spaces or parenthesis.
The password must be at least characters long.

trans-unit.note: Introduction paragraph of the web hosting provider section
Label for the hosting provider name
Label for the hosting provider address
Title of the section on cookies

trans-unit.source: Eternal-Twin avoids any non-necessary cookies.Necessary cookiesEternal-Twin uses cookies to support authentication and remember the user's preferred language. Those are first-party cookies required for the website to work. You may still disable them in your browser settings, but this may prevent the website from working.Other cookiesThere are no other cookies: no tracking, no analytics, no advertisement.
trans-unit.note: Body of the section on cookies
Title of the personal data section

trans-unit.source: Eternal-Twin stores user emails for authentication (sign-in and password recovery). No other personal data is stored. We do not share, sell or analyze any kind of personal data.
trans-unit.note: Body of the personal data section
Title of the donation section

trans-unit.source: If you are interested by the project and wish to contribute to it, several choices are offered to you :
trans-unit.note: Introduction to the donation section
Title of the Integrate the team item

trans-unit.source: The Eternal-Twin team is formed by enthusiasts who wish to see their favorite games persist despite the discontinuation of Flash technology.Join our Discord server if you also want to get into the adventure, we are always happy to welcome you !
trans-unit.note: Content of the Integrate the team item
Button of the Integrate the team item
Title of the Help development item

trans-unit.source: As Eternal-Twin is an ambitious project, all help for developing is welcome.If you are interested in browser games and have web develpment skills, feel free to contact our devs and read the documentation !
trans-unit.note: Content of the Help development item
Button of the Help development item
Title of the Encourage item

trans-unit.source: Small actions are sometimes the best ! The community is the core element of Eternal-Twin, which is why your feedback, your opinions and your encouragements are so important to us.Create an account and take part to the forum's activity !
trans-unit.note: Content of the Encourage item
Button of the Encourage item
Title of the Donate item

trans-unit.source: All Eternal-Twin games are entirely free, we depend entirely on your donations for our financial sustainability. We do not seek profit, so the money donated to the project will be used to maintain the required servers and services. Please note that donations are voluntary and do not bring any in-game benefits.For the sake of transparency, we have opted to use OpenCollective for donations and expenses management. OpenCollective is a reliable platform that lets you know exactly where your money is going.Our current objective is 50 per month. This amount will be split as follows : 20 for servers, 15 for email service, 10 for backups, 5 to 10 for domain names. The extra funds will be used to either provide better servers or saved for future expenses.
trans-unit.note: Content of the Donate item
Button of the Donate item
